page.title: 04BERRYNARBOR SOCIAL LIFE.
page.content:
The village has a very active and close community and there are many groups offering social and recreational opportunities. {Mother {and toddler group} meetson Tuesdays in school term time in the Manor hall.{ {Playgroup } for undre fives..Mon Wed and Fri mornings.{Youth club} for 8-15 year olds to provide activities and outings in the winter months on alternat Tuesdays.{Brownies}part of the national group meets on Thursdays and is for girls aged 7-10years. There is also a {Womens Institut}and a {Keep Fit Group } for adults. The {Mens {Instute }Is open every night. The men can play games like snooker and enjoy a drink with friends. All of these activities take place in the Manor Hall which used to be the Manor House.
{ }
